com.codename1.rad.events

Class EventContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.events.EventContext

  • public class EventContext
extends Object

    Encapsulates a context in which an ActionNode's event is fired. The context includes the Component that the event originated from, the Entity that the event relates to (usually the value obtained from EntityView.getEntity() of the view in which the event is fired), and the ActionNode that the event pertains to.
